TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PartChromeState extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定控制項和圍繞它的框線是在一般狀態還是在最小化狀態。

span.span: Specifies whether a control and the border surrounding it are in a normal or minimized state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉，代表 Web 組件控制項和其周圍的框線可以存在於可能可見狀態。The enumeration represents the possible visible states that a Web Parts control and its surrounding border can be in. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用使用自訂列舉ASP.NET Web 網頁中所參考的控制項。The following code examples demonstrate the declarative use of the enumeration by using a custom control referenced in an ASP.NET Web page. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 此範例的第一個部分包含名為的自訂控制項的程式碼`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of the example contains the code for the custom control, named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 因為控制項衍生自，也會繼承的通用屬性，類別提供，包括屬性，而列舉型別做為其傳回型別。Because the control derives from , it also inherits the common properties that the class provides, including the property, which uses the enumeration as its return type. [!code-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 請注意，在網站的宣告式標記頁面上，第二個執行個體`TextDisplayWebPart`控制設定其屬性。Note that in the declarative markup for the Web page, the second instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control sets its property. 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，會出現在最小化第二個控制項執行個體。After you load the page in a browser, the second control instance appears minimized. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/partoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/partoverviewvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState Minimized = int32(1)

summary.span: 在摺疊或最小化狀態的控制項和框線。

span.span: A control and border in a collapsed or minimized state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState Normal = int32(0)

summary.span: 在一般狀態的控制項和框線。

span.span: A control and border in a normal state.
